title: Prawn linguine with sugar snap peas
ingredients: ['450g uncooked linguini pasta', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon chilli oil', '650g medium prawns, peeled and deveined', '400g sugar snap peas', '2 large cloves garlic, minced', '350ml dry white wine', '60ml reserved pasta water', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped basil']
